channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The Homotopy Type of Spaces of Flat Connections for Classical Lie Groups
item.description: arXiv:2512.15004v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Let $M$ be a smooth manifold. We use Chern-Weil theory to study the characteristic classes of principal $G$-bundles built from continuous families of $\pi_{1}(M)$-representations, where $G$ is a compact Lie group. We then relate these families to the functorial map $$\text{Hom}(\pi_{1}(M), G)\rightarrow\text{Map}_{*}(M,BG)$$ and use this relationship to study the weak homotopy type of the space of flat connections for $U(n)$, $O(n)$, $SO(n)$, and $\text{Spin}(n)$ bundles.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Davis

item.title: Transfers on $\mathbb A^1$-connected components of quasi-split groups and the norm principle
item.description: arXiv:2512.15324v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We show that the sheaf of $\mathbb A^1$-connected components of a quasi-split group over a perfect field is a strictly $\mathbb A^1$-invariant sheaf with (Voevodsky) transfers. As a consequence, we show that the norm principle holds for any quasi-split group over a perfect field.
item.dc:creator: Amit Hogadi, Anand Sawant

item.title: Filtrations and cohomology III: cohomology of $E_\infty$ rings
item.description: arXiv:2512.15509v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We discuss filtrations arising from de Rham-type cohomology theories for $E_\infty$ rings and $E_n$ rings. Examples include the HKR filtration on relative topological Hochschild homology, the Hodge filtration on $E_\infty$ infinitesimal cohomology, and the Hodge filtration on $E_\infty$ de Rham cohomology.
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Antieau
